name: VR Dinosaur Gladiators
description:
This is a fascinating 3D virtual reality theme game, bringing you bloody and exciting dinosaur battle, allowing you to experience the survival competition in the dinosaur era.

Gameplay:

Welcome to the forest dinosaur fighting competition under the VR perspective! Here, you can choose your favorite dinosaur and bet on the game. Let's experience this unique game together!
Each player will have a certain gold coin as the starting capital. You only need to enter the game and select your supporting dinosaurs on the interface, and then invest in the corresponding amount. If the dinosaurs you support win, you will get the corresponding reward, otherwise, you will lose the principal of the bet.



This game makes you feel the stimulus of gambling and the tension of dinosaur battle. You can get more gaming experience by watching the dinosaur fight. In the game, you will see that the dinosaurs attacked each other with sharp minions and strong tails to survive in this dinosaur world. Each of these dinosaurs is very exciting and intense because they are competing for the final victory.
First, players need to choose a dinosaur as their own representatives to participate in the competition. There are many different dinosaurs to choose from, such as Tyrannosaurus, Triangle Dragon, Raptors, and so on. Planting dinosaurs has its own unique characteristics and attributes. You need to choose according to your preferences and strategies.



After the start of the game, your dinosaurs will fight fiercely with other dinosaurs. You can observe the entire process of the game from the VR perspective, and feel the killing and collision between dinosaurs. Only by winning in the battle can you win the game and reward. You can predict the victory of the game based on your understanding and judgment of dinosaurs. If your prediction is correct, you will get rich rewards. But if your prediction is wrong, you will lose your bet.



In general, this is a very entertaining and irritating game. Whether you are a dinosaur lover or the stimulus of gambling in the game, this game can meet your needs. Join the game, enjoy the tension and excitement of dinosaur battles, and betting the gambling experience.

Operation method:

Trigger key selection
